Package sagex.phoenix.event

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IEventBus
    Simple INterface for an EventBus
    PhoenixEventID
    All Global Phoenix Events should be registered here
    SageSystemMessageListener.Field  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EventBus
    Phoenix Event Bus is a proxy for the SageTV event bus, or in the event that phoenix is not loaded as a plugin, then a SimpleEventBus will be used.
    ReflectionEventListener  
    SageEventBus
    EventBus backed by the SageTV event system
    SageSystemMessageListener
    Writes Phoenix System Messages to the SageTV SystemMessages

    variable 'eventcode' will contain the event's code
    variable 'typename' will contain the event's subject
    SimpleEventBus  
    SystemMessageID
    System Event Message Id Groups for Phoenix
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    PhoenixEvent
    Annotation to use on a method of class that will accept a PhoenixEvent, which is proxy for the SageTV event system.
